# Who I am

Hey! I'm Vivian, a second-year undergraduate student at Rochester Institute of Technology, majoring in Computing and Information Technologies. Professional, I am primarily focused on High Performance Compute and Ultrascale systems. Personally, I enjoy spending time on or around bikes, in the outdoors, reading, and spending time with my partner.
